user_query: I am organizing a beach cleanup event and I need to know the tide heights and times for a particular station ID. Can you fetch the tide information for the given station ID in local times? Additionally, it would be great to have a list of all NOAA stations that provide tide predictions using the Get stations API.

TaskList.description: Fetch a list of all NOAA stations that provide tide predictions.
Get tide heights and times for the specified station ID in local times.
